QuestData.Title: Forge Ahead!
QuestData.Description:
There's more you must do.
Kill Itoka, master of the forge, and find a codex fragment from Fleshcrafter Hoku, gatekeeper of the Thunder King.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill the Master of the Forge and collect a Codex Fragment from Fleshcrafter Hoku in the Isle of Thunder.
